attributes.action: Pay Teaching Assistants fairly across the United Kingdom, removing many of them out of poverty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teaching Assistants provide a vital service in society but in areas such as Cornwall receive little more than the national minimum wage levels. I am calling for a decent wage paid on a uniform level across the UK. This will help to retain decent staff who make a positive difference to our children's lives.
